name: Turtle Mountain Trail
description: Turtle Mountain Trail offers a primitive route to the summit of soaring Monte Vista Peak out of Sycamore Canyon. Loop through this high and scenic region of the southern Chiricahuas.

name: Sneffels Highline Trail
description: Hike through alpine basins, fields of wildflowers, aspen trees, and above treeline backcountry. Perfect for those who have acclimated to the altitude and are looking for a full day adventure.

name: Hanging Lake Trail
description: Hanging Lake Trail is a heavily trafficked out and back trail located near Glenwood Springs, Colorado that features a lake and is rated as moderate.
